title: Frequently Asked Questions - Year 2

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website!

- Join our PATREON family for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST:

- Get your TBR merch and podcast transcripts

- Get a copy of TBR Book 

- YouTube: The Bible Recap Playlist

- The Bible Recap Show Notes

- Sign up to get our monthly email newsletter

 

PATREON:

- Join our PATREON family for bonus perks & The Bible Kneecap!

- The Bible Kneecap: FREE PREVIEW

- The Bible Kneecap Access List: Apps Capable of Private URL Links

- How to update your Patreon account

FAQs:

- FAQ Highlight Reel on Instagram 

- FAQ page of our website

- Questions page of our website

- Contact page of our website

QUESTION READERS:

Allison Congden

Courtney Vaughan

Jacqueline Terrel

Callie Summers

Joelle Smith

Sarah Yocum SOCIALS:

The Bible Recap: Instagram | Facebook | Twitter
